title: #AskYourElders
description: Ask Your Elders is a project connecting the people who have lived a full life with the young generations. In times of isolation, it is a way to approach our loved ones and create something meaningful. With your help, the elders are able to participate in modern ways of sharing and even give rise to creation of art. Letâ€™s do it together!
oneLiner: Some stories can only be heard by asking and listening.
